= Help =

== Creating Pages ==

To create a page on the iMarc standards wiki, simply create a file with the
filename `page.wiki`. The fully rendered HTML version of the page will be
available by browsing to `/page`. For example, the source of this page is 
accessible by visiting [/help.wiki help.wiki]. See the [#Syntax Syntax section]
for examples of creating links between pages.

== Syntax ==

Below is a list of the syntax supported by the iMarc standards wiki. Please note
that all headings (h1-h5) have an implicit heading based on their text.

=== Basic Text Formatting

||= Style                                                         =||= Markup                                                                                       =||= Output                                                                                    =||
|| h1                                                              || {{{= H1 =}}}                                                                                   || (((= H1 =)))                                                                                ||
|| h2                                                              || {{{== H2 ==}}}                                                                                 || (((== H2 ==)))                                                                              ||
|| h3                                                              || {{{=== H3 ===}}}                                                                               || (((=== H3 ===)))                                                                            ||
|| h4                                                              || {{{==== H4 ====}}}                                                                             || (((==== H4 ====)))                                                                          ||
|| h5                                                              || {{{===== H5 =====}}}                                                                           || (((===== H5 =====)))                                                                        ||
|| heading, custom id                                              || {{{= H1 = #custom-id}}}                                                                        || (((= H1 = #custom-id)))                                                                     ||
|| bold                                                            || {{{**text**}}}                                                                                 || **text**                                                                                    ||
|| italic                                                          || {{{//text//}}}                                                                                 || //text//                                                                                    ||
|| monospace                                                       || {{{`text`}}} //or// `{{{text}}}`                                                               || `text`                                                                                      ||
|| underline                                                       || {{{__text__}}}                                                                                 || __text__                                                                                    ||
|| strikethrough                                                   || {{{~~text~~}}}                                                                                 || ~~text~~                                                                                    ||
|| superscript                                                     || {{{^^text^^}}}                                                                                 || ^^text^^                                                                                    ||
|| subscript                                                       || {{{,,text,,}}}                                                                                 || ,,text,,                                                                                    ||
|| non-formatted                                                   || {{{!**text!**}}}                                                                               || !**text!**                                                                                  ||
|| paragraphs                                                      || {{{This is one paragraph\\\\\\This is another,\\\line breaks are not honored}}}                || (((This is one paragraph\\\\\\This is another,\\\line breaks are not honored)))             ||
|| line break                                                      || {{{This is one line\\ \\\This is another}}}                                                    || (((This is one line\\This is another)))                                                     ||

=== Links

||= Style                                                         =||= Markup                                                                                       =||= Output                                                                                    =||
|| url                                                             || {{{http://example.com}}}                                                                       || http://example.com                                                                          ||
|| email address                                                   || {{{john.smith@example.com}}}                                                                   || john.smith@example.com                                                                      ||
|| link                                                            || {{{[http://example.com Example.com]}}}                                                         || [http://example.com Example.com]                                                            ||
|| site link                                                       || {{{[/path/to/page Another Page]}}}                                                             || [/path/to/page Another Page]                                                                ||
|| relative link                                                   || {{{[./dir/../page Relative Page]}}}                                                            || [./dir/../page Relative Page]                                                               ||
|| anchor link                                                     || {{{[#anchor Another Section]}}}                                                                || [#anchor Another Section]                                                                   ||
|| anchor                                                          || {{{[=#anchor]}}}                                                                               || [=#anchor]                                                                                  ||
